module.name: Course Announcement Subscription
module.description: This module, when enabled, allows users to subscribe to the newsfeed from course announcements, much like they subscribe to forum threads.

release.notes: Please note that this module makes changes to some of the ATutor core files on installation. If you want a notification email to be sent to the user upon subscription/unsubscription, uncomment the appropriate lines in subscribe.php. This version of the module was updated to work with the ATutor 2 series.
